name: SquareNet
description:
Choose your teammate to control by using the 1-5 number keys.

Move your player using the arrow keys. You cannot do this if your player is holding the ball.

Press space (when you have the ball) to pass the ball to the player you are controlling. If you are controlling the player with the ball, you shall instead shoot at the net. You can only score after a number of passes , and you can only hold the ball (without passing or shooting) for so long, before having to hand over to the opposing team.
